Articles.Content: is there a mod package similar to the lamps and radial sensors that are offered in B9. also the landing gear would be cool
i want something that is independent of other mods (firespitter, etc), also i dont really want such a large part pack, the landing gear is only because the stock options are too limiting

The sensors and I believe the lights just use stock modules. You can safely prune the rest of the parts. And the Firespitter dll is not a huge dependency given how many different mods use it. The dll takes a very small amount of memory relative to models and textures.
